reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering, particularly noting how it accentuates curves and compliments different body types, while appreciating its fleece lining for warmth and comfort, especially on chilly nights.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, cozy, and absolutely beautiful!
items.body: I am in love with this dress! The inside is unbelievably warm and cozy â€” it feels like a soft hug the moment you put it on. The way it wraps around the body is just perfect, flattering in all the right places without feeling tight or uncomfortable. Iâ€™ve worn it both casually and dressed up, and every time it makes me feel beautiful and confident. Read more
items.author: sudip pokharel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress
items.body: Beautiful and flattering dress! I absolutely love this dress! The material is soft and stretchy, making it super comfortable to wear. The fit is perfect â€” it hugs the body nicely without being too tight. The ruched detail and crossed front design are very flattering and give it a stylish touch. I wore it for a night out and got so many compliments! The color is exactly as shown in the picture â€” a rich, elegant burgundy. Definitely worth the price. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Ingrid portillo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite dress!
items.body: This dress is perfect! Itâ€™s stretchy but thick! The inside is like fleece, super soft! The outside is sleek and silky smooth. It hides all the imperfect belly areas while accentuating your curves. You can pull it up for a shorter skirt without it looking weird, or pull it down for a longer skirt. I absolutely love it. I bought it in black and dark red, and it is perfect for casual or formal events! Can be dressed up or down. Fits true to size. I will probably order more colors. Super great quality for the price, I am VERY pleased. I honestly did not expect it to be as good as it is. I am 5ft and 193 lbs, I ordered an XL and it fits perfectly! Read more
items.author: Briana

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Short and Sexy
items.body: Ladies, this dress is perfect for a night out. It made me laugh a little when I slipped it on and realized that the inside fabric was of fleece-like quality. Hoes truly wonâ€™t get cold with this dress. As many have commented on the length of this dress, this is NOT a dress to drop it low in. I expect that I will be doing a lot of tugging when I wear this out. Planning on wearing tights to keep my anxiety at bay. Otherwise, itâ€™s sexy and fits as expected. I got a black dress in XL (5â€™6â€ and 190 lbs.) I saw other ladies with my measurements get an L, and I believe that it would fit just as well. Read more
items.author: Alex

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress!!
items.body: It is a good fabric. Thicker so perfect for colder weather. Itâ€™s shorter in the front because of the design but not quite a high/low situation. It is a stunning dress. Iâ€™m smaller on top and wider in the bottom and my arms are bigger! Itâ€™s a great dress and definitely worth the money! Read more
items.author: Kimberley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and affordableðŸ˜
items.body: This long sleeve dress is stylish. The fabric is thick and warm with an almost lightweight sweeter feel to it. It is stretchy and holds tight to the body for a clean look. I ordered based on the size chart and it fit perfectly Read more
items.author: Katt

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super tight
items.body: I must have received a used and/or defective dress-- there was no tag, and the medium dress felt like an XS. I like the material-- it's soft on my skin and it stretches. I might order a large to see if it will fit better. Read more
items.author: M. Teresa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering
items.body: This dress was pretty, very flattering. The material was pleasantly thicker than I thought it would be. And it was warm which was great for the cold temps. I am a true size medium, but based on other reviews I got this in a small for more form fitting, and it was perfect. I think a medium would have been too big and not as flattering. Although I was worried my hoo-ha might pop out if I made any sudden movements lol. Overall itâ€™s a very nice dress. Sexy but classy Read more
items.author: K. Gonzalez

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: (Long Sleeve)-wine Red, (Long Sleeve)-dark Green, (Long Sleeve)-red, (Long Sleeve)-dark Purple, Black, (Long Sleeve)-coffee, (Long Sleeve)-royal Blue, (Long Sleeve)-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
